description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ipp2","text":"As of April 28, 2022, this is the soil viromics laboratory protocol used in the Emerson group at UC Davis to generate viral DNA from a soil sample for shotgun metagenomic sequencing. By no means did we 'invent' this protocol! It is a mash-up of several previously published protocols, influenced most substantially by Göller et al. 2020, Trubl et al. 2019, Williamson et al. 2005, and, for the ultracentrifugation step, Emerson et al. 2012 (see references below). This version of the protocol appears in Santos-Medellin et al. 2022, which would be an appropriate citation if you follow the procotol precisely, but we recommend citing at least Göller et al. 2020 as well, and for any deviations, please consult and reference the original publications as appropriate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de11b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaeuo","text":"As part of this protocols.io page, you can find the laboratory protocol (under Steps), list of supplies and reagents (under Materials), and an extensive FAQ document (downloadable PDF under Guidelines \u0026 Warnings). If you are inclined to deviate from the protocol, please consult the FAQ document first, as we have a number of suggestions in there, as well as info about what we have and have not tried. steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"6decb","text":"Prepare PPBS buffer (https://microbiomejournal.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s40168-020-0795-2) (2% BSA, 10% PBS, 1% K-citrate, 150 mM MgSO4)



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c38f0","text":"Clean ultracentrifuge tubes - scrub, fill with NaOH for at least 1 hour (also soak black caps, but NOT metal red caps), \nrinse 3x with MilliQ water, rinse with 100 μl of 0.02 μm filtered UltraPure water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ca70d","text":"Autoclave bottle with buffer + empty bottle. 



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4oca1","text":"Once buffer bottle reaches room temperature, place it on a magnetic stir plate and slowly add BSA directly into the bottle (avoid foaming, don’t agitate too much). Add ~5 g of BSA at a time. 



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jm4p","text":"Filter through a 0.22 μm vacuum filter into the autoclaved empty bottle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jtaq","text":"Store in 4°C fridge (above freezing, not stable long-term, ~3 months, make sure buffer remains clear and \nuncontaminated by aliquoting only the amount needed). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55j6g","text":"Pre-cool the ultracentrifuge rotor: 50.2 Ti (12 samples) or 70Ti (8 samples) at 4 °C (overnight the night before), i.e., leave the rotor in the fridge or cold room. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65bs6","text":"Fresh soil is recommended, but if using frozen soil samples stored at -80°C, place samples in -20°C freezer overnight the night before. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6viq4","text":"Per sample, weigh 10 g soil into a 50 mL conical tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fc2gn","text":"Add 9 mL PPBS to 10 g soil. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3e0mt","text":"Shake (orbital shaker) at 300 rpm at 4°C for 10 min. If necessary, the shaking can be done at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8abho","text":"  Centrifuge at 4000 RPM at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3o6l2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E5203960C29611EC969749D3939E4F77","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emfmm","text":"Carefully pour supernatant into a new 50 mL conical \u0026 store supernatant at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4iav4","text":"Repeat steps 7-10 so that samples have gone through a total of 3x shaking (may need to vortex prior to shaking to loosen up soil; if so, reduce the shaking time by the amount of vortexing time) \u0026 3x centrifuging, and continue to pool supernatant into the same tube as in step 10. Should accumulate ~27 mL supernatant total (less if soils are high in organic matter). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqod","text":"Centrifuge conical containing accumulated supernatant for 8 min at 10,000 RCF (g) (7840 RPM) at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ggb9","text":"Transfer supernatant to new 50 mL conical tube. 



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93qqe","text":"Centrifuge the 50 mL conical tube containing supernatant (from step 13) for 8 min at 10,000 RCF (g) (7840 RPM) at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgcik","text":"(*optional*) Avoiding any pellet at the bottom of the tube, pre-filter the supernatant through a 5 μm filter into a new 50 mL conical tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33ifj","text":"Avoiding any pellet at the bottom of the tube, filter the supernatant through a 0.22 μm filter into an ultracentrifuge tube. Depending on the soil, you might need multiple filters, and/or this might be easier if you have pre-filtered (optional step 15 above).



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u65l","text":"Ultracentrifuge at 35,000 rpm \u0026 4°C under vacuum. Depending on the rotor, the length of spin will be different (according to sediment coefficient (s) = 58): 70Ti rotor (maximum 8 samples) = 3 hrs, 50.2Ti rotor (maximum 12 samples) = 2 hr 25 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12o5u","text":"Carefully pour or remove supernatant by pipette, taking care not to disturb the viral pellet (which may or may not be visible, but you will often see a 'hole punch-sized' brown or yellow pellet).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75j43","text":"DNase treatment is recommended, especially for fresh soil, but it may not be possible for some soils (e.g., very dry soil or soils stored frozen). If not DNase treating samples, go to first step of DNA Extraction below (and follow special instructions). 



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":150,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc4nq","text":"Before removing tubes from the ultracentrifuge, pay attention to their orientation in the rotor so that you know where to expect the pellet of viral particles (on the lower outside of the tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uqn3","text":"Keep a record of how your ultracentrifuge tubes are labeled and which tube will go with which sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a372j","text":"Make master mix (per sample: 10 μl of DNase buffer + 10 μl of DNase).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f1s9","text":"Add 20 μl of master mix to resuspended virions. Mix by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"da54e","text":"Incubate at 37°C for 30 min.



","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50m7k","text":"Add 10 μl of Stop solution. Briefly vortex. Proceed to first step of DNA Extraction (and follow special instructions).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6acs8","text":"In principle, many DNA extraction protocols would work at this point. You can try your favorite. We use the QIAGEN PowerSoilPro DNeasy kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nva","text":"To prepare, aliquot an appropriate amount of each solution. Keep CD2 at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bf86q","text":"Prepare Sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fv1da","text":"Turn on heat block to 65°C (ours takes about 15 min to reach temperature) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gee2","text":"Spin the PowerBead Pro Tube briefly to ensure that the beads have settled at the bottom.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5aueh","text":"Add up to 800 μl of CD1 to bead tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"m71p","text":"Vortex briefly to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18j8q","text":"Incubate on heat block at 65°C for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"am34t","text":"Cell Lysis ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"67nhp","text":"Vortex tubes at maximum speed for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"jj24","text":"Centrifuge tubes at 15,000 x g (RCF) for 1 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6omla","text":"Inhibitor Removal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2902","text":"Transfer supernatant to new microcentrifuge tube. (expect 500-600 μl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9reuv","text":"Add 200 μl CD2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"17s7m","text":"Vortex 5 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cse5n","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 x g (RCF) for 1 min. Avoiding the pellet, transfer up to 700 μl of supernatant to a new \nmicrocentrifuge tube. (expect 500-600 μl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a8a54","text":"Bind DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3r6dv","text":"Add 600 μl CD3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cmg8m","text":"Vortex for 5 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9q52h","text":"Load 650 μl of lysate to an MB Spin Column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"chocd","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 x g (RCF) for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q212","text":"Discard the flow-through and repeat previous steps to ensure that all the lysate has passed through the MB \nSpin Column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v2ff","text":"Carefully place the MB Spin Column into a new collection tube (provided).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5ge9","text":"Wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"285m6","text":"Add 500 μl EA to the MB Spin Column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ais7m","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 x g (RCF) for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm5t9","text":"Discard the flow-through and place the MB Spin Column back into the same 2 ml collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aq9lr","text":"Add 500 μl of C5 onto spin column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a5rih","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 x g (RCF) for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bujp2","text":"Discard the flow-through and place the MB Spin Column into a new 2 ml collection tube (provided).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44uig","text":"Centrifuge at 16,000 x g (RCF) for 2 min. Carefully place the MB Spin Column into a new 1.5 ml elution tube \n(provided).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3bjc","text":"Elute DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21p9g","text":"Add 50-100 μl of C6 to center of the white filter membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gg89","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 x g for 1 min. Discard the MB Spin Column. The DNA is now ready for downstream \napplications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"af2ln","text":"Quantify DNA w/ method of choice (e.g., Qubit, use 2 μl, https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/Qubit_dsDNA_HS_Assay_UG.pdf). Store short-term (up to a few weeks) at -20°C after quantification, longer term at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
